name: Accuracy Up
effect: Increases Accuracy by 600. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Attack Boost
effect: Increases Attack by 30%. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: Does not stack with [Significant Attack Boost].

name: Attack Speed Boost
effect: Increases attack speed by 45%. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: Does not stack with [Significant Attack Speed Boost].

name: Crit Damage Up
effect: Increases critical damage by 45%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Crit Up
effect: Increases Crit by 600. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Damage Boost
effect: Increases damage dealt by 30%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Damage Reduction Up
effect: Increases Damage Reduction by 30%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Dodge Up
effect: Increases Dodge by 600. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Dragon Roar
effect: Increases Attack and all defense by 5% to Luminaries of the corresponding faction.
remark: This effect is enhanced by the Dragon Roar Level.

name: Lifesteal
effect: Increases Lifesteal by 30%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Magic Defense Up
effect: Increases Magic Defense by 35%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Physical Defense Up
effect: Increases Physical Defense by 35%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Significant Attack Boost
effect: Increases Attack by 45%. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: Does not stack with [Attack Boost].

name: Significant Attack Speed Boost
effect: Increases attack speed by 70%. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: Does not stack with [Attack Speed Boost].

name: Accuracy Down
effect: Reduces Accuracy by 600. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Attack Down
effect: Reduces Attack by 30%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Attack Speed Down
effect: Reduces Attack Speed by 45%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Crit Down
effect: Reduces Crit by 600. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Damage Reduction Down
effect: Reduces Damage Reduction by 30%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Dodge Down
effect: Reduces Dodge by 600. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Heal Block
effect: Reduces healing received by 100%. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: Doesn't stack with [Healing Down].

name: Healing Down
effect: Reduces healing received by 50%. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: Doesn't stack with [Heal Block].

name: Lifesteal Down
effect: Reduces Lifesteal by 30%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Magic Defense Down
effect: Reduces Magic Defense by 35%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Physical Defense Down
effect: Reduces Physical Defense by 35%. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Stat Debuff
effect: Includes Attack Down, Bonus Damage Down, Damage Reduction Down, Physical Defense Down, Magic Defense Down, Attack Speed Down, Crit Down, and Crit Damage Down.

name: Adrenaline
effect: Increases Attack by 20%. Additional Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: Increases Attack by an additional 20% while in the [Wild] status.

name: Awakening
effect: Special Arcane Wisdom faction status. Lasts until the end of the battle.
remark:
Gained when any ally Luminary unleashes an Overdrive.
Can stack up to 9 times.

name: Deathrattle
effect: Special Otherworld Return faction status. Lasts until the end of the battle.
remark: Each time this status is gained, it restores 2% of Max HP. Can stack up to 30 times.

name: Elemental Reaction
effect: Elemental Echo faction special effect.
remark:
Includes [Detonation], [Evaporation], and [Flash Freeze].
[Ignite] and [Shock] can trigger [Detonation].
[Chill] and [Ignite] can trigger [Evaporation].
[Shock] and [Chill] can trigger [Flash Freeze].

name: Punishment
effect: Illusion Veil faction special effect.
remark: Automatically triggers when a skill that can activate Punishment targets a Luminary with an Overdrive Energy cost of at least 4.

name: Wild
effect: Special Wild Spirit faction status.
remark:
This status continuously consumes Rage.
This status ends when Rage is depleted.

name: Charm
effect: Prevents using skills and forces attacks towards the charmer's target.

name: Freeze
effect: Cannot take action. Unable to move, attack, or cast skills.

name: Petrify
effect: Cannot take action. Unable to move, attack, or cast skills.

name: Silence
effect: Cannot cast active skills.

name: Stun
effect: Unable to move, attack, or cast skills.

name: Taunt
effect: Forces the target to attack themselves and prevents them from using active skills.

name: Time Stasis
effect: Cannot take action. Unable to move, attack, or cast skills.

name: Basic Elemental Debuff
effect: Includes [Ignite], [Chill], and [Shock].

name: Chill
effect: Reduces healing effects by 15%. Lasts 10 seconds.
remark:
Triggers [Evaporation] when the target is afflicted with [Ignite].
Triggers [Flash Freeze] when the target is afflicted with [Shock].

name: Detonation
effect: When triggered, immediately deals magic damage equal to 30% of the target's Max HP.
remark: Triggers when a target afflicted with [Ignite] is also afflicted with [Shock].

name: Elemental Debuff
effect:
Advanced Elemental Debuffs: [Evaporation] and [Flash Freeze].
Basic Elemental Debuffs: [Ignite], [Chill], and [Shock].

name: Evaporation
effect: When triggered, immediately deals magic damage equal to 10% of the target's Max HP. Reduces Accuracy by 1500. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: Triggers when a target afflicted with [Ignite] is also afflicted with [Chill].

name: Flash Freeze
effect: When triggered, immediately deals magic damage equal to 10% of the target's Max HP. Reduces Attack Speed by 150%. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: Triggers when a target afflicted with [Shock] is also afflicted with [Chill].

name: Ignite
effect: Deals magic damage equal to 3% of the target's Max HP every 2 seconds. Lasts 10 seconds.
remark:
Each instance of damage cannot exceed 100% of Attack.
Triggers [Detonation] when the target is afflicted with [Shock].
Triggers [Evaporation] when the target is afflicted with [Chill].

name: Shock
effect: Reduces Crit Resist by 200. Lasts 10 seconds.
remark:
Triggers [Detonation] when the target is afflicted with [Ignite].
Triggers [Flash Freeze] when the target is afflicted with [Chill].

name: Blessing Buff
effect: Includes [Morale] and [Fervor].

name: Fervor
effect: Increases Physical Defense, Magic Defense, and Bonys Damage by 15%. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: This effect is doubled while in the [Grace] status.

name: Grace
effect: Special Sanctum Glory faction status. Lasts until the end of the battle.
remark: While in this status, [Morale] and [Fervor] effects are doubled.

name: Morale
effect: Increases Attack and Damage Reduction by 15%. Lasts 8 seconds.
remark: This effect is doubled while in the [Grace] status.

name: Balance
effect: Increases Damage Reduction.
remark:
Can stack up to 3 times.
Decreases by 1 stack every 6 seconds.

name: Black Dragon Claw
remark: Lasts for 6 seconds, can be stacked up to 5 times.

name: Blade Shadow
effect: Can be stacked up to 20 times. Lasts for 6 seconds.

name: Commander's Intimidation
effect: Cannot be dispelled. Reduces damage dealt by the target to self by 8%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts for 8 seconds.

name: Copy
effect: The copied summon will have the same attributes, duration, and buffs/debuffs as the original summon, and its health will be at full. If a summon other than itself is copied, the maximum number of copies will be calculated separately from the original summon.

name: Curse
effect: A debuff that cannot be stacked and cannot be dispelled.

name: Cursed Domain
effect: Increases Overdrive Energy cost by 1 and reduces Magic Defense by 20%.
remark: Lasts 30 seconds, can be stacked up to 6 times.

name: Divine Melody
effect: Grants immunity to [Healing Down] and [Heal Block], and increases Damage Reduction based on current HP percentage. Lasts for 6 seconds.

name: Drunken Fragrance
effect: Reduces the skill haste by 10 per stack, up to a maximum of 8 stacks, lasting 8 seconds.

name: Equilibirum
effect: Resets the target's health percentage to the current team's average health percentage, unaffected by healing effects.

name: Exile
effect: During the exile period, the player cannot be selected, cannot trigger passive skills, and all skill cooldowns and buff durations are frozen. The player cannot be exiled when there is only 1 Luminary left on the field.

name: Flame Armor
effect: Increases Physical Defense by 30%. Lasts until the end of the battle.

name: Frost Barrier
effect: When receiving lethal Damage, become frozen for 3 seconds, becoming Immune to lethal Damage while recovering HP equal to 400% of Attack (up to 100% of max HP).
remark: Can only trigger once per battle.

name: Full Moon
remark: Cannot be stacked, cannot be dispelled.

name: Governor's Intimidation
remark: Lasts 30 seconds, can be stacked up to 6 times.

name: Inheritance
effect: Whenever the user applies a buff to another friendly unit, the target gains an additional attack bonus.

name: Lakeside Protection
effect: Possessed allied Luminary gains a shield equal to 400% of Attack and increasing its Attack by an amount equal to 41% of the Lady of the Lake's Attack (up to 100% of Attack).

name: Life Link
effect: Increases Damage Reduction by 20% and redirects 60% of damage taken to Athena. Lasts for 8 seconds.
remark: Can only trigger once per ally Luminary.

name: Momentum Burst
remark: Cannot be dispelled.

name: Moon Soul
remark: Lasts for 6 seconds, can be stacked up to 5 times.

name: Radiant Ember
effect: Lasts until the end of battle. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Sanctuary
effect: Grants immunity to stat debuffs and elemental debuffs while active. Duration increases with [Radiant Sanctuary] level.

name: Seal
effect: If the sealed skill is an active skill, it cannot be used; if it is a passive skill, it will not take effect (it will not affect passive effects that have already been triggered).
remark: Ineffective against Boss.

name: Sunfire
effect: Each stack reduces magic defense by 9%, stacking up to 6 times, lasting 10 seconds.
remark: Cannot be dispelled.

name: Sword Clone
effect: A special elite summon that cannot be copied.

name: Tentacle
effect: Non-Elite Summoning Item.

name: Two Heavens Imprint
effect: When Rin is present, when an allied unit carrying [Deathrattle] deals damage to a target carrying [Two Heavens Imprint], each hit of damage will additionally deal damage equal to the number of [Deathrattle] stacks multiplied by 9% of the damage source's attack. If the damage is dealt by Rin or a [Sword Clone], the additional damage will be increased to the number of [Deathrattle] stacks multiplied by 36% of the attack.
remark: Lasts 8 seconds, cannot be stacked.

name: Withering Thorns
effect: The target takes 800% of the target's attack as physical damage every 2 seconds (up to a maximum of 1600% of the attacker's own attack), for 8 seconds.
remark: There can be at most one status target on the field.
